reviews.review_msg: I took Econ 102 with her at UBC and I really enjoyed this class. It was difficult at first, but after getting into the groove of her teaching style and tests it's easy to tell she really cares about both the students and economics. She is passionate and reviews plenty to ensure students are on the same page.

Exams were very unfair, makes typos in her confusing fill in the blanks and asks for ambiguous explanations in the true and false portion. Answers questions asked by students in a dismissive manner. Just horrible.
Not so good lectures, bores students and ideas are not clear.
